title: Bug 32770: Java application launch shortcut error doesn't provide useful information to the user
description: Bug 32770: Java application launch shortcut error doesn't provide useful information to the user. Additionally, we should improve the quality of the error message.
EB: The error message should give the user a clear hint about what they need to do to fix the problem. In this case, they need to select a resource. The error message should say something like 'Launch failed: No file with a main type selected.'
